ygData.subject: Re: 16th Rank Water Breathing Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have to go inside the keep, where the guards are.  There is a whole other zone.  I won t say where it is inside, but this should get you there. Jyzan
ygData.messageBody:
"Mott, Mike J." wrote:

> From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
> I have searched all of High Hold Keep and have yet to find the song. In my
> frustration I moved out of the keep into the pass, and subsequently died to
> a VERY nasty Dark Elf NPC in one of the Inns. I realize this is requesting
> a spoiler, but when I died to the NPC last night I lost my level, and am
> pretty frustrated at this point. E-mail privately if you wish.

You have to go inside the keep, where the guards are. There is a whole other
zone. I won't say where it is inside, but this should get you there.

Jyzan
